original: 精通曆算，縝密謀略，依據戰局而臨陣變化、破敵謀略。奪街亭阻北伐致揮淚斬馬謖；蜀國上下皆忌憚三分。
text: Proficient in calendar calculations, careful strategy, changes in battle according to the situation, and strategies to break the enemy. Duojie Pavilion blocked the Northern Expedition and cut the horse with tears; Shu Kingdom was afraid of three points.
